entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Whistler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:09 p.m. PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 8 except 12 near Pemberton. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 8 except 12 near Pemberton. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. A few wet flurries and rain showers beginning overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High 6 except 10 near Pemberton.
entry.summary: A few wet flurries and rain showers changing to a few rain showers in the morning. High 6 except 10 near Pemberton. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
